about_the_game:
The people of Parmesia need you!

  • Discover the tale of the Legendary Captain Pierre Legrand, as he stands against the threat of the evil emperor Lepetit in the Campaign Mode.
  • A fully presented story, powered by the charm of the styllized 3D and Diesel Punk art styles.
  • Not all is about flying. Between missions, take your time to relax in the base, customize your pilot, or prepare your planes for the next mission.



Much more than a single player arcade shooter!

  • Relive the adrenaline of classic flight arcades with modern controls and updated gameplay.
  • Dominate the hights with an arsenal of weapons and power-ups.
  • Collect resources in the field to survive or buy new planes and upgrades.
  • Pilot and planes customization.
  • The Commanders will not remain indifferent to your feats. FACE THEM IN EXCITING BOSS BATTLES!
  • Dozens of unlockables and achievments to put your skills to the test!



Your Base, more than a simple hub!

  • Reveal the story of the great Pierre Legrand in the Single Player CAMPAIGN MODE.
  • Unlock environments by completing levels in Single Player ARCADE MODE.
  • Enjoy and experiment with everything you have unlocked in the Single Player ENDLESS MODE.
  • Engage in exciting races against your friends in the local and online Multiplayer PARTY MODE.
  • Try to best each other up in the local and online Multiplayer BATTLE MODE.
  • Put those skills to the test together in the local and online Multiplayer BOSS RUSH MODE.

    ¡THE MOST COMPLETE AERIAL EXPERIENCE AWAITS YOU!
detailed_description:
The people of Parmesia need you!

  • Discover the tale of the Legendary Captain Pierre Legrand, as he stands against the threat of the evil emperor Lepetit in the Campaign Mode.
  • A fully presented story, powered by the charm of the styllized 3D and Diesel Punk art styles.
  • Not all is about flying. Between missions, take your time to relax in the base, customize your pilot, or prepare your planes for the next mission.



Much more than a single player arcade shooter!

  • Relive the adrenaline of classic flight arcades with modern controls and updated gameplay.
  • Dominate the hights with an arsenal of weapons and power-ups.
  • Collect resources in the field to survive or buy new planes and upgrades.
  • Pilot and planes customization.
  • The Commanders will not remain indifferent to your feats. FACE THEM IN EXCITING BOSS BATTLES!
  • Dozens of unlockables and achievments to put your skills to the test!



Your Base, more than a simple hub!

  • Reveal the story of the great Pierre Legrand in the Single Player CAMPAIGN MODE.
  • Unlock environments by completing levels in Single Player ARCADE MODE.
  • Enjoy and experiment with everything you have unlocked in the Single Player ENDLESS MODE.
  • Engage in exciting races against your friends in the local and online Multiplayer PARTY MODE.
  • Try to best each other up in the local and online Multiplayer BATTLE MODE.
  • Put those skills to the test together in the local and online Multiplayer BOSS RUSH MODE.

    ¡THE MOST COMPLETE AERIAL EXPERIENCE AWAITS YOU!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13 High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13 High Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.5 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8000 Series or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Diesel Burners

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8000 Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Diesel Burners is a fast-paced aerial shooter. Destroy hordes of enemies while collecting resources and power-ups. Buy, upgrade, and customize your character and planes; and put your skills to the test facing bosses in a variety of single-player and multiplayer modes!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain
